name: Lime-Shrimp Avocado Pasta Salad
author: MANDYMARTIN
summary: A fresh springtime pasta salad perfect for a Cinco de Mayo celebration.
ingredients: 2 pounds uncooked shrimp - peeled, deveined, and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Marinate shrimp overnight with 1/4 cup lime juice in a large bowl covered with plastic wrap
Heat shrimp in a microwave-safe bowl  until they are bright pink on the outside, about 6 minutes
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook cellentani in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 12 minutes
Drain, then rinse with cold water until cool
Mix shrimp, pasta, avocados, grape tomatoes, red onion, and cilantro in a bowl
Whisk olive oil, 1/4 cup lime juice, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, salt, and black pepper in a bowl until dressing is well mixed
Pour dressing over shrimp mixture; toss to coat
